description:
-----------------------------------------------
Panorama 360, GifBoom, Photo Booth, Live effect ,HDR and Movie Maker Camera, Now is in one Camera.
-----------------------------------------------

Do you want such a camera APP, which has lots of professional camera features, classic photo filter effects, fashion camera appearances and various photo post processing effects that only can be generated in the professional photography darkroom?

Fotolr Camera Studio is the camera APP which provides the most professional camera features and is very easy to operate. You could use it to take high quality photos whether you are a professional or a beginner .

Features:
1) Shooting mode: Anti-shake mode, Voice Shutter mode, Countdown mode, Continuous mode, Normal mode.
2) Photo Filter: More than 20 real-time effects such as Lomo, Sepia, Symmetry, Light tunnel...
3) The photo post processing: Adjustment of the effects of photo environment, portrait, weather effects and other post-processing.
4) Dynamic Shooting Mode: could generate the animated GIF images.
5) Photo sharing: Share to be Facebook, Twitter etc.

Various functions and effects! Ready to shoot?
